tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE harassment_prevention (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_description TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  date TIMESTAMP,
  action_taken TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS harassment_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(50),
    reported_person_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS discrimination_cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_date DATE,
    victim_name VARCHAR(50),
    accused_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE incident_log (
  incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date TIMESTAMP,
  incident_type TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  handled BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE complaints (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    complaint_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    resolved_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT NOT NULL,
    reporter_id INT NOT NULL,
    report_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    resolved_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE actions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    action_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
